00024 #define _xstr_(s) std::string(#s)

00031 const LogLevel Application::LLMap[] = {LogLevel( 0 ), error, warning, info, verbose_info}; //uhh I'm soo devious
00032 
00033 Application::Application( const char name[] ): m_name( name )
00034 {
00035     Selection dbg_levels( "error,warning,info,verbose_info" );
00036     dbg_levels.set( "warning" );
00037     parameters["dCore"] = dbg_levels;
00038     parameters["dCore"].setDescription( "Debugging level for the Core module" );
00039     parameters["dCore"].hidden() = true;
00040     parameters["dData"] = dbg_levels;
00041     parameters["dData"].setDescription( "Debugging level for the Data module" );
00042     parameters["dData"].hidden() = true;
00043     parameters["dImageIO"] = dbg_levels;
00044     parameters["dImageIO"].setDescription( "Debugging level for the ImageIO module" );
00045     parameters["dImageIO"].hidden() = true;
00046     parameters["help"] = false;
00047     parameters["help"].setDescription( "Print help" );
00048     BOOST_FOREACH( ParameterMap::reference ref, parameters ) //none of these is needed
00049     ref.second.needed() = false;
00050 }
00051 Application::~Application() {}
00052 
00053 bool Application::init( int argc, char **argv, bool exitOnError )
00054 {
00055     bool err = false;
00056     m_filename = argv[0];
00057 
00058     if ( parameters.parse( argc, argv ) ) {
00059         if ( parameters["help"] ) {
00060             printHelp( true );
00061             exit( 0 );
00062         }
00063     } else {
00064         LOG( Runtime, error ) << "Failed to parse the command line";
00065         err = true;
00066     }
00067 
00068     if ( ! parameters.isComplete() ) {
00069         std::cout << "Missing parameters: ";
00070 
00071         for ( ParameterMap::iterator iP = parameters.begin(); iP != parameters.end(); iP++ ) {
00072             if ( iP->second.needed() ) {std::cout << "-" << iP->first << "  ";}
00073         }
00074 
00075         std::cout << std::endl;
00076         err = true;
00077     }
00078 
00079     if( parameters["dCore"].isSet() ) {
00080         setLog<CoreDebug>( LLMap[parameters["dCore"]->as<Selection>()] );
00081         setLog<CoreLog>( LLMap[parameters["dCore"]->as<Selection>()] );
00082     }
00083 
00084     if( parameters["dData"].isSet() ) {
00085         setLog<DataDebug>( LLMap[parameters["dData"]->as<Selection>()] );
00086         setLog<DataLog>( LLMap[parameters["dData"]->as<Selection>()] );
00087     }
00088 
00089     if( parameters["dImageIO"].isSet() ) {
00090         setLog<ImageIoDebug>( LLMap[parameters["dImageIO"]->as<Selection>()] );
00091         setLog<ImageIoLog>( LLMap[parameters["dImageIO"]->as<Selection>()] );
00092     }
00093 
00094     if ( err ) {
00095         printHelp();
00096 
00097         if( exitOnError ) {
00098             std::cout << "Exiting..." << std::endl;
00099             exit( 1 );
00100         }
00101     }
00102 
00103     return ! err;
00104 }
00105 void Application::printHelp( bool withHidden )const
00106 {
00107     std::cout << this->m_name << " (using isis " << getCoreVersion() << ")" << std::endl;
00108     std::cout << "Usage: " << this->m_filename << " <options>, where <options> includes:" << std::endl;
00109 
00110     for ( ParameterMap::const_iterator iP = parameters.begin(); iP != parameters.end(); iP++ ) {
00111         std::string pref;
00112 
00113         if ( iP->second.needed() ) {
00114             pref = ". Required.";
00115         } else if( iP->second.hidden() ) {
00116             if( !withHidden )
00117                 continue; // if its hidden, not needed, and wie want the short version skip this parameter
00118         }
00119 
00120         if ( ! iP->second.needed() ) {
00121             pref = ". Default: \"" + iP->second.toString() + "\"";
00122         }
00123 
00124         std::cout << "\t-" << iP->first << " <" << iP->second->typeName() << ">" << std::endl;
00125 
00126         if ( iP->second->is<Selection>() ) {
00127             const Selection &ref = iP->second->cast_to<Selection>();
00128             std::cout << "\t\tOptions are: " <<  ref.getEntries() << std::endl;
00129         }
00130 
00131         std::cout << "\t\t" << iP->second.description() << pref << std::endl;
00132     }
00133 }
00134 
00135 boost::shared_ptr< _internal::MessageHandlerBase > Application::getLogHandler( std::string module, isis::LogLevel level )const
00136 {
00137     return boost::shared_ptr< _internal::MessageHandlerBase >( level ? new util::DefaultMsgPrint( level ) : 0 );
00138 }
00139 const std::string Application::getCoreVersion( void )
00140 {
00141 #ifdef ISIS_RCS_REVISION
00142     return STR( _ISIS_VERSION_MAJOR ) + "." + STR( _ISIS_VERSION_MINOR ) + "." + STR( _ISIS_VERSION_PATCH ) + " [" + STR( ISIS_RCS_REVISION ) + "]";
00143 #else
00144     return STR( _ISIS_VERSION_MAJOR ) + "." + STR( _ISIS_VERSION_MINOR ) + "." + STR( _ISIS_VERSION_PATCH );
00145 #endif
00146 }
